title: Solomonâ€™s Wisdom and Wealth
summary: Solomon becomes king and seeks God at Gibeon. God appears to him and offers anything he desires. Solomon asks for wisdom, which pleases God, who also grants him great riches and honor.

faq.question: What did Solomon ask God for?
faq.answer: He asked for wisdom to lead the people.

faq.question: How did God respond?
faq.answer: God gave him wisdom along with riches, honor, and power.
